Key.Original: 8×8 wheeled armored mortar carrier of the Stryker family of combat vehicles produced by General Dynamics Land Systems. It is in use with the United States Army. Armed with 120mm mortar.
Key.English: 8×8 wheeled armored mortar carrier of the Stryker family of combat vehicles produced by General Dynamics Land Systems. It is in use with the United States Army. Armed with 120mm mortar.
Key.Russian: 8×8 колесный бронированный минометный транспортер семейства боевых машин Stryker производства General Dynamics Land Systems. Используется в Армии Соединенных Штатов. Вооружен 120мм Миномётом.

Key.Original: American self-propelled 105mm artillery installation (SAU), class self-propelled howitzers. Created in 1953-1960 in parallel with the 155-mm self-propelled guns M109. Serial production began in 1962, but by 1963 it was curtailed in favor of the more powerful M109, only 355 M108 were released.
Key.English: American self-propelled 105mm artillery installation (SAU), class self-propelled howitzers. Created in 1953-1960 in parallel with the 155-mm self-propelled guns M109. Serial production began in 1962, but by 1963 it was curtailed in favor of the more powerful M109, only 355 M108 were released.
Key.Russian: Американская самоходная 105мм артиллерийская установка (САУ), класса самоходных гаубиц. Создана в 1953—1960 годах параллельно со 155-мм САУ M109. Серийный выпуск начался в 1962 году, однако к 1963 году был свёрнут в пользу более мощной M109, всего было выпущено лишь 355 M108.
